name: Super Space Meltdown
description: Super Space Meltdown - 2D dungeon-crawler. In space! Humanities largest space station is under attack by mysterious alien invaders. You play as Sgt. Alex Cutter sent into deep space on a lone mission to save the day and annihilate the alien threat. But there's a catch.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Processor: 2.0 Ghz i5 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 105 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The game does not even open, and it is still being sold with actual money.  Yes, developers are responsible. Who else? Shame on you, Valve, Steam.
